Title: The Time of the Doctor
Writer: Steven Moffat, Terry Nation (characters: "Daleks"), Kit Pedler (characters: "Cybermen"), Gerry Davis (characters: "Cybermen"), Robert Holmes (characters: "Sontarans")
Actors: Matt Smith, Jenna Coleman, Orla Brady, James Buller
Plot: The Doctor's worst enemies, The Daleks, The Cybermen, The Angels and The Silence, return, as the doctor's eleventh life comes to a close, and his twelfth life begins.
